import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Home

About

The Employee Performance Analytics Dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of workforce productivity and efficiency. It leverages data analytics to track key performance indicators, including individual and team achievements, project timelines, and goal fulfillment. This dynamic dashboard enables management to make informed decisions by visualizing trends, identifying top performers, and addressing areas for improvement. With real-time data updates, it enhances transparency, fosters accountability, and facilitates strategic planning. The intuitive interface and interactive features make it an invaluable tool for organizations seeking to optimize employee performance and drive overall business success.
